announcements.title: College Orientation 2025
announcements.message: Welcome to all freshmen! The college orientation will be held at the Main Auditorium on August 20, 2025, starting at 9:00 AM. Attendance is mandatory.

announcements.title: Library Hours Extended
announcements.message: Starting August 15, 2025, the library will be open from 6:00 AM to 11:00 PM Monday through Friday to support student studies.

announcements.title: Scholarship Applications Open
announcements.message: Scholarship applications for the Academic Year 2025-2026 are now open. Deadline for submission is September 30, 2025. Visit the Guidance Office for more details.

announcements.title: Student Organization Fair
announcements.message: Join us for the Student Organization Fair on August 22, 2025, at the Student Center from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Discover clubs and organizations to join!

announcements.title: System Maintenance Notice
announcements.message: The student portal will undergo maintenance on August 19, 2025, from 12:00 AM to 6:00 AM. Services may be temporarily unavailable.

announcements.title: Final Examination Schedule Released
announcements.message: The final examination schedule for the first semester has been released. Students can check their exam schedules on the student portal or visit the Registrar's Office.

announcements.title: Career Fair 2025
announcements.message: Annual Career Fair will be held on September 5, 2025, at the College Gymnasium. Over 50 companies will participate. Bring your resumes!

announcements.title: New WiFi Network Available
announcements.message: A new high-speed WiFi network 'TCC-5G' is now available across campus. Contact the ICT Office for access credentials.

announcements.title: Sports Festival Registration
announcements.message: Registration for the Annual Sports Festival is now open. Various sports competitions available. Register through the Office of Student Affairs.

announcements.title: Mental Health Awareness Week
announcements.message: Mental Health Awareness Week will be held from August 28 to September 1, 2025. Free counseling sessions and workshops available at the Guidance Office.
